outputs.output_descr:
The Project focuses on the following: 
i) Strengthening capacities for enabling policy and regulatory frameworks, institutional arrangements and capacities at individual, institution and systems levels to achieve a holistic climate change and disaster risk reduction
ii)Climate Change and disaster risk reduction investment

project_descr: GRZ and UN Joint Programme on Climate Change and Disaster Risk Reduction
project_title: Joint Programme on Climate Chnge & Disaster Risk Reductn
